section.heading: Required licenses for agents or brokers; compensation to unlicensed agents prohibited; violations

annotations.annotation: Former § 35-1301 was also amended by § 10(p) of D.C. Law 11-268, became effective on May 21, 1997. The amendment by D.C. Law 11-268, substituted “Commissioner of Insurance and Securities” for “Superintendent of Insurance of the District” in the first sentence.
